      This method executes the anti-power up fucntion, which causes ghosts to go into invisible mode.

      This method conducts the fruit function.

      This method will return the calculated heuristic (Euclidean distance).

      • getPossibleTurns

        public java.util.List<Tile> getPossibleTurns()

        Returns:
        possibleTurns

      • setIntersection

        public void setIntersection(Tile[][] map)
        This method will take in a matrix and find all the intersections located in the matrix. Additionally, it will go through all possible Tiles and determine whether the neighbouring tiles of each Tile is a possible and valid move.
        Parameters:
        map - a matrix
